text: Onon, ki ojoti Moro inkor kardaand, onhoro ʙa otase, ki ʙuzurg ast va haroratas ʙisjor ʙaland ast, mesuzonem. Har goh ki pusthojason ʙisuzad, ʙa coi on pusthoi digar qaror medihem, to saxtarin azoʙro ʙicasand. Va cun kufrro ʙa surati hamesagi takror kardan cun sifat va odati onho gardidaast, azoʙ ham ʙar onho takror mesavad, to sazoi ʙaroʙar ʙo a'moli xudro ʙuʙinand. Hamono Alloh aziz va hakim ast
